      name - MenuItem's name.
      description - MenuItem's description.
      price - MenuItem's price.
      isAvail - MenuItem's state of availability.
      category - MenuItem's category.

    • editMenuItem

      public boolean editMenuItem(String originalName, String newName, String newDescription, float newPrice, boolean newAvailability, MenuItem.Category newCategory)
      Editing a MenuItem.
      Parameters:
      originalName - MenuItem's original name.
      newName - MenuItem's new name.
      newDescription - MenuItem's new description.
      newPrice - MenuItem's new price.
      newAvailability - MenuItem's new state of availability.
      newCategory - MenuItem's new category.
      Returns:
      State to indicate whether editing a MenuItem is successful.
